item.title: Crouton Explained on an HP Chromebook 11
item.description: In episode 1721 of hak5 host Darren explains what Crouton is, what chrooted environment means and how you can run Linux on a Chromebook.

item.title: Steam In-Home Streaming Demoed on a Toshiba Chromebook 2
item.description: This video demonstrates game play on a Toshiba Chromebook 2 running Xubuntu via Crouton using the Steam In-Home Streaming technology.

item.title: How to Run Linux on Chromebooks with Crouton
item.description: In this video tutorial YouTuber Johnny Phung shows how you can run other Linuxes than Chrome OS on Chromebooks using a software called crouton.

item.title: Run Chrome OS and Linux simultaneously on the Chromebook Pixel
item.description: In this demo video Kevin Tofel of Gigaom shows how you can use Google's Chromebook Pixel with other Linux based operating systems than Chrome OS.
